description: Very easy to make and very moreish.
name: Peanut Butter Choc Chip Cookies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk sugars, salt, butter and peanut butter together to form a smooth paste.
Add flour, baking powder and choc chips and fold in with a wooden spoon until a dough forms. It will be quite firm and should come together to be a dark golden brown.
Add egg and vanilla essence and whisk to smooth.
Cover the bowl with cling film and chill the cookie dough in fridge for at least 30 minutes (even overnight).
Scoop dough into 12 large (or 24 smaller balls) and place on baking paper. Flatten tops (note that due to the peanut butter these will not spread but rather will hold their shape).
Bake for 12 minutes, until the cookies start to brown on the edges.
Cool cookies on a wire rack for 10 minutes before tucking in.
